title.en: Aspiration for the Spread of the Guhyagarbha Teachings

text.en: Fundamental realization of all the victorious ones of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa kün gyi gongpé til

text.en: Quintessence of the inner tantric vehicles, great Magical Illusion,
text.en-trans: nang gyü tekpé yang chü gyutrul ché

text.en: The real meaning of the glorious Secret Essence tantra—
text.en-trans: palden sangwé nyingpö gyü kyi dön

text.en: May its study and practice spread throughout the world!
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé sateng khyab gyur chik

text.en: May we realize the meaning of the dharmakāya, the two truths indivisible,
text.en-trans: den nyi yermé chökü dön tok shing

text.en: May the music of the samādhi of great purity and equalness resound,
text.en-trans: dak nyam chenpö tingdzin rolmo trol

text.en: May we gain the results of the path, the four levels of a vidyādhara,
text.en-trans: lam gyur rigdzin nam zhi drebu nyé

text.en: And may we ultimately attain the sovereign domain of Vajrasattva!
text.en-trans: dorjé sempé gyalsa tob gyur chik

text.en: Through the power of the natural truth of this, the king of tantras,
text.en-trans: gyü kyi gyalpö chönyi den tob kyi

text.en: May all the faults and failings of these evil times be pacified,
text.en-trans: nakchok dü kyi güpa kün zhi zhing

text.en: And may all be auspicious for the teachings of Buddhism in general
text.en-trans: gyalten chi dang ngé sang nyingpo yi

text.en: And this definitive Secret Essence in particular to spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tenpa dar zhing gyepé tashi shok
